verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> we who are strong <S%G1415><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> to bear <S%G941><s%> the weaknesses <S%G771><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> without <S%G102><s%> strength <S%G102><s%> and not [just] please <S%G700><s%> ourselves. <S%G1438><s%>
Let each <S%G1538><s%> of us please <S%G700><s%> his neighbor <S%G4139><s%> for his good, <S%G18><s%> to his edification. <S%G3619><s%>

For even <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> did not please <S%G700><s%> Himself; <S%G1438><s%> but as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "The reproaches <S%G3680><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who reproached <S%G3679><s%> Thee fell <S%G1968><s%> upon Me."

For whatever <S%G3745><s%> was written <S%G4270><s%> in earlier <S%G4270><s%> times <S%G4270><s%> was written <S%G1125><s%> for our instruction, <S%G1319><s%> that through <S%G1223><s%> perseverance <S%G5281><s%> and the encouragement <S%G3874><s%> of the Scriptures <S%G1124><s%> we might have <S%G2192><s%> hope. <S%G1680><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> may the God <S%G2316><s%> who gives <S%G1325><s%> perseverance <S%G5281><s%> and encouragement <S%G3874><s%> grant <S%G1325><s%> you to be of the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G5426><s%> with one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%>

that with one <S%G3661><s%> accord <S%G3661><s%> you may with one <S%G1520><s%> voice <S%G4750><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> and Father <S%G3962><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Wherefore, <S%G1352><s%> accept <S%G4355><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> accepted <S%G4355><s%> us to the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For I say <S%G3004><s%> that Christ <S%G5547><s%> has become <S%G1096><s%> a servant <S%G1249><s%> to the circumcision <S%G4061><s%> on behalf <S%G5228><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to confirm <S%G950><s%> the promises <S%G1860><s%> [given] to the fathers, <S%G3962><s%>

and for the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> to glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for His mercy; <S%G1656><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> I will give <S%G1843><s%> praise <S%G1843><s%> to Thee among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> And I will sing <S%G5567><s%> to Thy name. <S%G3686><s%>"
And again <S%G3825><s%> he says, <S%G3004><s%> "Rejoice, <S%G2165><s%> O Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> with His people. <S%G2992><s%>"
And again, <S%G3825><s%> "Praise <S%G134><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> you Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> And let all <S%G3956><s%> the peoples <S%G2992><s%> praise <S%G1867><s%> Him."

And again <S%G3825><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "There shall come <S%G1510><s%> the root <S%G4491><s%> of Jesse, <S%G2421><s%> And He who arises <S%G450><s%> to rule <S%G757><s%> over the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> In Him shall the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> hope. <S%G1679><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> may the God <S%G2316><s%> of hope <S%G1680><s%> fill <S%G4137><s%> you with all <S%G3956><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> and peace <S%G1515><s%> in believing, <S%G4100><s%> that you may abound <S%G4052><s%> in hope <S%G1680><s%> by the power <S%G1411><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

And concerning <S%G4012><s%> you, my brethren, <S%G80><s%> I myself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> am convinced <S%G3982><s%> that you yourselves <S%G846><s%> are full <S%G3324><s%> of goodness, <S%G19><s%> filled <S%G4137><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> and able <S%G1410><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to admonish <S%G3560><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

But I have written <S%G1125><s%> very <S%G5112><s%> boldly <S%G5112><s%> to you on some <S%G3313><s%> points, <S%G3313><s%> so <S%G5613><s%> as to remind <S%G1878><s%> you again, <S%G1878><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> that was given <S%G1325><s%> me from God, <S%G2316><s%>

to be a minister <S%G3011><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> ministering <S%G2418><s%> as a priest <S%G2418><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that [my] offering <S%G4376><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> might become <S%G1096><s%> acceptable, <S%G2144><s%> sanctified <S%G37><s%> by the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> found reason <S%G2746><s%> for boasting <S%G2746><s%> in things pertaining <S%G4314><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

For I will not presume <S%G5111><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> of anything <S%G5100><s%> except <S%G3756><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> has accomplished <S%G2716><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> me, resulting <S%G1519><s%> in the obedience <S%G5218><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> by word <S%G3056><s%> and deed, <S%G2041><s%>

in the power <S%G1411><s%> of signs <S%G4592><s%> and wonders, <S%G5059><s%> in the power <S%G1411><s%> of the Spirit; <S%G4151><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that from Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> and round <S%G2945><s%> about <S%G2945><s%> as far <S%G3360><s%> as Illyricum <S%G2437><s%> I have fully <S%G4137><s%> preached <S%G4137><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And thus <S%G3779><s%> I aspired <S%G5389><s%> to preach <S%G2097><s%> the gospel, <S%G2097><s%> not where <S%G3699><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was [already] named, <S%G3687><s%> that I might not build <S%G3618><s%> upon another <S%G245><s%> man's foundation; <S%G2310><s%>

but as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "They who <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G312><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> news <S%G312><s%> of Him shall see, <S%G3708><s%> And they who have not heard <S%G191><s%> shall understand. <S%G4920><s%>"
For this <S%G1352><s%> reason <S%G1352><s%> I have often <S%G4183><s%> been hindered <S%G1465><s%> from coming <S%G2064><s%> to you;

but now, <S%G3570><s%> with no <S%G3371><s%> further <S%G3371><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> for me in these <S%G3778><s%> regions, <S%G2824><s%> and since I have had <S%G2192><s%> for many <S%G2425><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> a longing <S%G1974><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you

whenever <S%G5613><s%> <S%G1437><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> to Spain <S%G4681><s%> – for I hope <S%G1679><s%> to see <S%G2300><s%> you in passing, <S%G1279><s%> and to be helped <S%G4311><s%> on my way <S%G4311><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> by you, when I have first <S%G4413><s%> enjoyed <S%G1705><s%> your company for a while <S%G3313><s%> –
but now, <S%G3570><s%> I am going <S%G4198><s%> to Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> serving <S%G1247><s%> the saints. <S%G40><s%>

For Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> and Achaia <S%G882><s%> have been <S%G2106><s%> pleased <S%G2106><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> a contribution <S%G2842><s%> for the poor <S%G4434><s%> among the saints <S%G40><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

Yes, <S%G1063><s%> they were pleased <S%G2106><s%> [to do so,] and they are indebted <S%G3781><s%> to them. For if <S%G1487><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> have shared <S%G2841><s%> in their spiritual <S%G4152><s%> things, <S%G4152><s%> they are indebted <S%G3784><s%> to minister <S%G3008><s%> to them also <S%G2532><s%> in material <S%G4559><s%> things. <S%G4559><s%>

Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> when I have finished <S%G2005><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> and have put <S%G4972><s%> my seal <S%G4972><s%> on this <S%G3778><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of theirs, <S%G846><s%> I will go <S%G565><s%> on by way <S%G1223><s%> of you to Spain. <S%G4681><s%>
And I know <S%G3609><s%> that when I come <S%G2064><s%> to you, I will come <S%G2064><s%> in the fulness <S%G4138><s%> of the blessing <S%G2129><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I urge <S%G3870><s%> you, brethren, <S%G80><s%> by our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> and by the love <S%G26><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> to strive <S%G4865><s%> together <S%G4865><s%> with me in your prayers <S%G4335><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> for me,

that I may be delivered <S%G4506><s%> from those <S%G3588><s%> who are disobedient <S%G544><s%> in Judea, <S%G2453><s%> and [that] my service <S%G1248><s%> for Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> may prove <S%G1096><s%> acceptable <S%G2144><s%> to the saints; <S%G40><s%>
so <S%G2443><s%> that I may come <S%G2064><s%> to you in joy <S%G5479><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and find <S%G4875><s%> [refreshing] rest <S%G4875><s%> in your company.
Now <S%G1161><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> be with you all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
